job.title: AI / Machine Learning Engineer (Virtual - Early Career)
job.description: The Lockheed Martin Artificial Intelligence Center (LAIC) team is seeking an inquisitive developer responsible for investigating and implementing services that enhance MLOps deployment as a part of the AI Factory, an enterprise Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (ML/AI) platform. The selected candidate will focus on model test, optimization, monitoring, and explainability. The selected candidate will also contribute to a broad range of projects across the enterprise to increase machine learning availability and value to Lockheed Martin.<br><br><strong><u>The Selected Candidate’s Responsibilities Will Include<br></u></strong><ul><li> Identifying existing model test and deployment pain points</li><li> Researching, understanding, and evaluating third-party or in-house technology solutions</li><li> Developing relationships with third-party technology providers</li><li> Supporting evaluation initiatives by implementing and evaluating model test and monitoring software solutions</li><li> Collaborating with MLOps, data, and infrastructure teams</li><li> Presenting evaluation outcomes and recommend enterprise-wide solution next steps<br></li></ul>The selected candidate can work at any major Lockheed Martin facility or remotely (in the US). Must be a US Citizen.<br><br>--
